√jvar 'be hot'

present: [1.] jvarati etc. U.+  

[perfect: jajvāra  ajijvarat  ajvārīt  ]

future: [1.] jvariṣyati   -- [2.] jvaritā  

secondary: passive: jvaryate   -- intensive: jājvarya-  jājūr-   -- desiderative: jijvariṣa-   -- causative: jvarayati etc.  

derivatives: jvara AV.+  -jvāra RV.C.  

Another form of √jval, and apparently related with jṛ, jur, jūrv.
